title: Their Submissive Switch
description: Nick continues to teach Sondra more about the lifestyle they share and the things a submissive needs to know...how to follow rules being one of the most important. He's glad she's come around to sharing sex in the office and her old issues with boss sex. She's certainly taught him a few things and he loves it. Sondra strives to make Nick proud of her as she learns all he shares with her but...is he aware she's learning more than he ever imagined? How will he react if and when Sondra decides to take what SHE wants for a change? She's tired of taking orders, being told what to do and how to perform. Now it's her turn to say how their office sex will go and she continues to enjoy sex with her boss! Be sure to read all the books in this Book #1: The Contract Book #2: Office Training Goes Home Book #3: Sharing Among Friends Book #4: Their Submissive Switch Book #5: Under Her Command
author: Tonya Kinzer
